title: Basic chilli con carne
ingredients: ['1 green chilli', '1 red chilli', '2 tablespoons oil, divided', '800g beef mince', '1 onion, finely chopped', '4 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 green pepper, diced', '1 red pepper, diced', '2 (400g) tins whole plum tomatoes', 'chilli powder', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '500ml beef stock', '400g tin red kidney beans, drained', '425g sweetcorn kernels (optional)', '1 bunch parsley, finely chopped']
